name: Where do you go? (gameboy engine test)
name_original: Where do you go? (gameboy engine test)
description:
(this is just a prototype, I'm learning to use a new game engine(GB STUDIO) for making Gameboy like games, this is just a place to put as a way to archive what I made)I made this in  8 hours.

this game is just a quick test of features, just random tinkering and seeing what I can or cannot do. there is nothing special, just a small adventure game, about finding some stuff, and also seeing what I can do with pixel art

currently like this engine, small And fun to work on, might make another game, that actually has more mechanics too it, prob a tank shooter perhaps?

sorry if its not good, as said I never done pixel art much, or used a 2d engine like this before...
